## BusinessProcessType.cdTopologyTypeId property

Topology type id of the Business Process Type.

This property can not be null or empty.

CdTopologyType with specified "CdTopologyTypeId" must exist in the associated Topology Manager. The endpoint address of the associated Topology Manager is stored in the environment variable with name "TRIDION_TTM_SERVICEURL".

This property is not localizable.

The value of this property is the id of the topology type from the associated Tridion Topology Manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get cdTopologyTypeId(): string;
```
